name: Oil Transport Truck Driver
description:
Start your oil tanker engine and drive the powerful engine of cargo oil transporter. Enjoy the oil cargo truck driving experience with heavy off road mountain traffic. Avoid tanker truck crashes while crossing and don't drive your truck above speed limit. Oil Transport Truck Driver is one of the best liquid fuel cargo transporter truck game with an ultimate fun of oil tanker parking and driving experience. Join the transportation tycoon and play the real uphill oil tanker game that requires real oil tanker driving skills to control the heavy duty trailer on offroad tracks. Your main job is to make sure continuous oil to offroad gas stations and petrol pumps.

Features:
Realistic oil tanker trucks multiplicity
Interesting interface and back music
Gorgeous missions and eye catching climate
